section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgments and opinions of the Court to announce in 74-1107, Cappaert against the United States, consolidated with 74-1304, Nevada against the United States and for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit is affirmed.
